selectedVerses.text: You who say that one must not commit adultery, do you commit adultery? You who abhor idols, do you rob temples?
yet you will plunge me into a pit, and my own clothes will abhor me.
All my intimate friends abhor me, and those whom I loved have turned against me.
I will make my dwelling among you, and my soul shall not abhor you.
And you shall not bring an abominable thing into your house and become devoted to destruction like it. You shall utterly detest and abhor it, for it is devoted to destruction.
